about_the_game:
Welcome to Cocktail Girl Service!

Take on the role of an inexperienced manager who has just inherited a cozy cafe from his ancestor. And an unpayable debt to boot.

You have to hire and develop waitresses, improve your cafe and seat guests in the cafe hall. The days are depressing with their routine, but in the evenings you can go on dates with beautiful girls and develop relationships with them.

Try to stay afloat in this capitalist world and get closer to the girls to find out their dreams. Who knows where the fulfillment of their desires will lead.

Game features:

— Complex, at first glance, management of your waitresses and the working day.

— Managing a cafe is not just a routine job, but a strategic undertaking, where every step has weight and every guest is important. In the end, work only warms up interest in the evening.

— Feel the excitement of getting maximum profit.

— Immerse yourself in many short stories! All girls are unique, with their own character traits and dreams. Each date holds surprises, because as you get to know the girls better, you will discover new sides of their personalities and stories. Get to know them all.

— The dates are written in a text novella with spicy pictures.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains adult content including frequent nudity, erotic descriptions, sexual scenes/scenarios, references to alcohol use. All the characters in the game are over 21 years old.

detailed_description:
Welcome to Cocktail Girl Service!

Take on the role of an inexperienced manager who has just inherited a cozy cafe from his ancestor. And an unpayable debt to boot.

You have to hire and develop waitresses, improve your cafe and seat guests in the cafe hall. The days are depressing with their routine, but in the evenings you can go on dates with beautiful girls and develop relationships with them.

Try to stay afloat in this capitalist world and get closer to the girls to find out their dreams. Who knows where the fulfillment of their desires will lead.

— Complex, at first glance, management of your waitresses and the working day.

— Managing a cafe is not just a routine job, but a strategic undertaking, where every step has weight and every guest is important. In the end, work only warms up interest in the evening.

— Feel the excitement of getting maximum profit.

— Immerse yourself in many short stories! All girls are unique, with their own character traits and dreams. Each date holds surprises, because as you get to know the girls better, you will discover new sides of their personalities and stories. Get to know them all.

name: Cocktail Girl Service

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-3210
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 635M
  • Storage: 1350 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-10400
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 1350 MB available space

short_description: Cocktail Girl Service is a simple cafe simulator where you are a cafe manager during the day and in the evenings you get close to the waitresses, take them on dates or develop the cafe.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese, Russian, Japanese
